definition: prefix used before the surname of a person or a numeral indicating the order of birth of the children in a family or to indicate affection or familiarity/old (of people)/venerable (person)/experienced/of long standing/always/all the time/of the past/very/outdated/(of meat etc) tough
class/rank/grade/equal to/same as/to wait for/to await/et cetera/and so on/et al. (and other authors)/after/as soon as/once
to nourish one's skin/to maintain a youthful appearance
to make life longer/to promise longevity/(this product will) extend your life
to improve one's appearance (using cosmetics or cosmetic surgery)/to make oneself more attractive/to beautify
to detoxify/to relieve fever (in Chinese medicine)
to strengthen one's body/to keep fit/to build up one's health (through exercise, nutrition etc)
to calm (soothe) the nerves/to relieve uneasiness of body and mind
health protection/health care/to maintain in good health
to take a tonic or nourishing food to build up one's health
